definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Shinar = Babylonia (= Bab. Šumêr acc. to COT:Ge 11, 1 al., >denied by Hal:Rev. Crit. 1883, 44 Jen: ZK ii(1885), 419; Egypt.Sangar (WMM:As. u. Eur. 279), TelAm. Šanḫar (Wkl:TelAm. 25) identif. with ´[[שׁ]]: by Mey:Egyptiaca 63; cf., further, Pinches:Hast. DB SHINAR);—´[[אֶרֶץ שׁ]]: Ge 10:10, Ge 11:2, Zec 5:11, Da 1:2; ´[[מֶלֶח־שׁ]]: (Amraphel) Ge 14:2, Ge 14:9; ´[[שׁ]]: alone Is 11:11 (as place of diaspora); ´[[אַדֶּרֶת שׁ]]: Jos 7:21; LXX usu. Sen(n)aar; Zc Zec 5:11 (e)n gh=) Babulw=nov.
